mapper.insert: insert into member (mxid, mxpw, mxname, mxmail, mxoffice, mxdiv, regdate) values (#{mxid}, #{mxpw}, #{mxname}, #{mxmail}, #{mxoffice}, #{mxdiv}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d'))
mapper.select: select mxseq, mxid, mxpw, mxname, mxseq, mxdiv, mxoffice, mxmail from member where mxid=#{mxid} and mxpw=#{mxpw}
mapper.update: update member set mxpw=#{mxpw}, mxname=#{mxname}, mxmail=#{mxmail} where mxid=#{mxid}
